messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] rain dance
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/7/2000 11:36:13 AM Central Daylight Time, ... OOh, you promise so much. . .My, my, it hasn t rained here in Dallas since June 30th.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/7/2000 11:36:13 AM Central Daylight Time,
Broadcolea@... writes:

> Julie,
> Well, you know, I try my best. Anyway, anything I can do to get the rain
> out
> of here for a day or to. Yesterday was beautiful. It was cool, but when
> the
> sun came out it was so nice and warm. The little ones and I had a pinic
> lunch in our yard. The ground was actually dry!!
>
> Sandy


OOh, you promise so much. . .My, my, it hasn't rained here in Dallas since
June 30th. That's something like 70 days. I really want to go tubing in the
Hill Country, but I don't think they have any rivers left down there. (Hey,
Pris -- you're in San Antonio, aren't you? Isn't there someone else on the
list who's down round there in the Hill Country?) Anything you'd like to
ship down would be greatly appreciated. Either that or a recipe for a rain
dance.

Carron
